cubium.ui.select_se.title: Select Search Engine
cubium.ui.browser.title: Browser
cubium.ui.browser.bookmarks.title: Cubium Bookmarks
cubium.ui.browser.history.title: Cubium History
cubium.ui.browser.settings.title: Cubium Settings
cubium.ui.browser.settings.user_agent.no: Note: You need to restart the game for the changes to take effect.
cubium.ui.browser.settings.user_agent.in: Leave empty to use the default MCEF user agent. Use 'random' to generate a random one.
cubium.default_se.none.title: None
cubium.default_se.google.title: Google
cubium.default_se.google.description: The world's leading search engine, offering comprehensive search results.
cubium.default_se.bing.title: Bing
cubium.default_se.bing.description: Microsoft's search engine with an engaging image search, and solid search results.
cubium.default_se.duckduckgo.title: DuckDuckGo
cubium.default_se.duckduckgo.description: A privacy-focused search engine that does not track or store user data.
cubium.default_se.ecosia.title: Ecosia
cubium.default_se.ecosia.description: An eco-friendly search engine that uses ad revenue to plant trees.
cubium.default_se.yahoo.title: Yahoo!
cubium.default_se.yahoo.description: One of the oldest search engines, powered by Bing and integrated with a news portal.
cubium.default_se.startpage.title: Startpage
cubium.default_se.startpage.description: A privacy-centric search engine that delivers Google results without tracking users.
cubium.default_se.yandex.title: Yandex
cubium.default_se.yandex.description: Russia’s largest search engine, offering its own suite of services like maps.
cubium.default_se.baidu.title: Baidu
cubium.default_se.baidu.description: The leading search engine in China, optimized for Chinese-language content.
cubium.default_se.brave.title: Brave
cubium.default_se.brave.description: A private search engine that operates without relying on third-party indexes.
